Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board -- 6.91 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special tax of six and ninety-one hundredths (6.91) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $360,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of giving additional aid and support to the public schools in Grant Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Consolidated School District No. 33 -- 2.59 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated School District No. 33 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 33 of Grant Parish, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a two and fifty-nine hundredths (2.59) mills on all property subject to taxation in said School District (an estimated $109,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating public school buildings and other school-related facilities in said School District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Georgetown Sch. Dist. No. 16 Prop. No. 1 -- 4.25 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Georgetown School District No. 16 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Georgetown School District No. 16 of the Parish of Grant, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special tax of four and twenty-five hundredths (4.25) mills on all property subject to taxation in said School District (an estimated $14,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating public school buildings and other school-related facilities in said School District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Georgetown Sch. Dist. No. 16 Prop. No. 2 -- 15.86 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Georgetown School District No. 16 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Georgetown School District No. 16 of the Parish of Grant, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special tax of fifteen and eighty-six hundredths (15.86) mills on all property subject to taxation in said School District (an estimated $55,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating pubIic school buildings and other school-related facilities in said School District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Montgomery School District No. 21 -- 4.38 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Montgomery School District No. 21 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Montgomery School District No. 21 of the Parish of Grant, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special tax of four and thirty-eight hundredths (4.38) mills on all property subject to taxation in said School District (an estimated $12,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating public school buildings and other school-related facilities in said School District?
